requirement.design: Devs must be able to add the clip editor in html as a web component.
Devs must be able to programmatically link a clip to an editor.
Users must be able to draw new notes onto the clip.
Users must be able to select a bend drawing mode, where they can draw bend data onto a clip.
Users must be able to filter which channels to show data for. By default it will show data for all channels.
Users must be able to zoom in and out.
Users must be able to add control change 'channels' to the clip editor. They can then select one of the channels to draw CC data into.
Users must be able to select a velocity drawing mode, where for each note they can draw in its velocity, either as a constant value, or changing over time.
